data.description:
Last update on 05/01/2022

It is extremely important for us at DERMAZONE that we maintain the confidentiality and security of your personal information, and any information about you that you provide to us when using our site, such as information you provide when registering for a user account or when entering into transactions via the site, which may include (for example) your name is indicated. contact information, gender, date of birth and occupation; They are collected as “Personal Information”, and any reference to “we” and “us” is to DERMAZONE.

This privacy policy applies only to information we collect through the laboratory website and includes all content and pages within the website.

The information we collect and how we use it

We do not usually collect your information, but we may ask you for your email for any reason we find appropriate in sending you by mail, such as sending the results of your periodic examination or offering you exclusive offers.

We may record the Internet Protocol address, operating system and browser used by each user and may be able to determine - based on the IP address - the user's Internet service provider and the geographic location of their connection point.

We use a variety of internet analysis tools to collect this information, however some information is collected by cookies, and you should be able to control whether and how your browser accepts cookies as most browsers provide instructions for how to reset your browser to refuse cookies through the "help" is in the toolbar, but if you reject "cookies" from our site, many of the features and benefits that our site offers you may not work as intended.

Use and disclosure to others

We do not disclose any information about you to any other party. The confidentiality and security of the information is available, and you are completely free not to send any e-mail to you as long as you do not subscribe to any offers we put on our site.

The Site may contain links to third party websites such as other content providers and some service providers, but these other websites are not under our control and you understand and agree that we are not responsible for the collection and use of your information by these websites unless otherwise indicated in this Privacy Policy. We encourage you to be careful when you are directed to a third party website to review the privacy policies of each website you visit and use.

Privacy Policy Changes

Please keep in mind that we review this Privacy Policy periodically and may make some changes. When we make any changes, the Privacy Policy link will contain a “Recent revision (with date)” sign indicating that you should review the new provisions that are effective immediately upon posting the new policy on This page with a new effective date. This tag will remain at the top of the page below the title.

At Dermazon Store, we believe that beauty and wellness are the right of everyone. That’s why we’ve built two integrated platforms to provide the best international and local products in skincare, haircare, health, and makeup.

Since our launch, our goal has been to be a trusted destination for those seeking authentic products, a seamless shopping experience, and exceptional customer service. We constantly strive to deliver the latest innovations in the world of beauty and health, while maintaining high quality and global standards.

Our Mission

Our mission is to empower our customers to take care of themselves through carefully selected products, supported by science, and services that prioritize their comfort and confidence.

Our Vision

To become the leading platform in beauty and personal care across Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, and the Middle East, and to be the first choice for those seeking quality and trust.

Our Values

Quality: We are committed to providing genuine, certified, and reliable products.

Transparency: We present product details clearly to help our customers make informed decisions.

Innovation: We keep up with the latest solutions in the beauty and wellness industry.

Customer First: A smooth experience from browsing to order delivery.

Why Choose Us?

- 100% authentic products.
- A wide range of global and local brands.
- Fast shipping and continuous support.
- Years of expertise with thousands of satisfied customers.

Last Updated: 30-09-2022

Due to high demand, the shipping and delivery period may extend from 7 to 10 business days for some orders.

At Dermazon, we strive to ensure the quality of our partners’ products and to deliver your purchases in good condition. If you encounter any issue with your order for any reason, please email us at customercare@dermazonestore.com
, and we will do our best to resolve it.

Please report any issue within 7 days of your order. We will be happy to provide a suitable solution as required, under the following terms:

Shipping and postal fees cannot be refunded unless the product is defective.

For your safety and health, vitamins and dietary supplements (including Beauty Gummies) cannot be exchanged or returned. If the customer requests a refund due to failed delivery, cancellation after shipping, or returning the order after receipt, the full value of such products will be deducted from the refund, in addition to full shipping, return, and customs costs (if applicable).

Misuse or tampering with products may prevent approval of returns.

Once products are received by the company, an assessment and settlement of the refund value will be made as appropriate.

Refunds will be processed using the same payment method.

Approved refunds are processed within 7 to 21 business days, and a confirmation email will be sent.

Refund Policy

You may request a refund in the following cases:

Damaged Products
If a product is damaged and this is proven upon receipt from the shipping company, you must contact customer service at customercare@dermazonestore.com
 within 2 days of delivery and attach photos of the damaged item.
Refund will be the product price as shown on the invoice (original price minus any applied discounts). Dermazon may offer compensation via store credit instead of cash.

Order Cancellation Before Shipping
If you wish to cancel all or part of your order before it is prepared and shipped, email us at customercare@dermazonestore.com
.
Refund will be processed for the product value as per the invoice.
If cancellation is requested after preparation or shipping, shipping fees and any related costs will be deducted. Refund will only be processed after the returned order is received.

Delivery Failure Due to Incorrect Customer Information
If delivery fails because of incorrect mobile number, incomplete address, or failure to respond to the courier, you may request a refund by emailing us.
Shipping fees and related costs will be deducted. The remaining order value will be refunded once the return is received.
If the customer wishes to re-ship the order, shipping costs must be paid again.

Delayed Orders Beyond 14 Business Days
If more than 14 business days have passed since the order date without any delivery attempt or communication, the customer has the right to cancel the order and receive a full refund without deduction.

Defective Products

Only defective products in their original condition are eligible for return. Opened products are not accepted unless defective.
If the defective product is opened and returned, shipping costs must be covered by the customer. The product will be sent to the manufacturer for inspection.
If the manufacturer confirms it is defective, you may choose either:

A full refund (including shipping costs), or

A replacement product.

Cancellation Policy

We aim to process your order promptly. If you wish to cancel, please email customercare@dermazonestore.com
 as soon as possible.

If the order has not yet shipped, we will cancel it.

If already shipped, you must return it, and shipping fees will be deducted. The remaining amount will be refunded.
Cancelled orders after dispatch are considered returns and subject to the return policy.

Disclaimer

Dermazon does not endorse or take responsibility for the accuracy of any opinion, advice, or statement available on our websites. We are not liable for any loss or damage resulting from reliance on content.
You are responsible for evaluating the accuracy, completeness, and usefulness of any information or advice. Please consult professionals as needed regarding financial, health, lifestyle, or other matters.

Shipping & Customs Policy

Delivery fees apply based on company estimates for GCC countries. For other regions, shipping fees are calculated based on courier rates.

Large orders not shipped via Express Delivery are subject to additional charges. Orders may be held until these charges are paid.

Dermazon is not responsible for lost orders due to incorrect customer information. If the address is incorrect and not corrected within 14 days, the order will be canceled.

Each order is shipped separately.

Delivery dates are not guaranteed, but we will make every effort to deliver on time. Tracking numbers are provided.

Customs regulations vary by country. Customers are responsible for ensuring the legality of their purchases in their delivery country.

Dermazon is not responsible for confiscated or prohibited items. Customs duties and import taxes are the responsibility of the customer.

If an order is returned to us due to customs, we will refund the product value minus shipping fees.

Note: International shipping (Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Bahrain, Iraq, Jordan, Egypt, UAE, and all countries except Saudi Arabia) may take an additional 7–10 business days and may incur customs charges fully borne by the customer.
